Not sure why people are so crazy about this place or maybe I just ordered the wrong thing. Got a veggie burger and was disappointed. The filling was ok but the bread was terrible. The service was good but the aircon didn't work very well. It was too hot where we sat.

I have been searching for the best burger in Hanoi and no doubt this is the best place. It literally blew me away with their amazing burgers and nachos. I have never writen a review on food before, but Chops is such an exception so I have to force myself to write one.
